long_description: Masters degree in versatility, PhD in fit and only a first grade reading level required for installation! Custom fit for vehicles with or without rain gutters. Ball-and-socket mechanism allows the rack to self-adjust to any roof/door geometry. Quick-cam makes installation a snap. Strong, stainless-steel clips fit tight doors. Requires Yakima round bars and Q Clips, sold separately. Lockable with Yakima SKS Lock Cores, sold separately.
short_description: Masters degree in versatility, PhD in fit and only a first grade reading level required for installation!
